mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(blog blog_pno_pk) */ pno, title, regexp_substr(content,'[^('||chr(13)||chr(10)||')]+',1,1) as content, writer, regDate FROM tbl_blog WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT pno, title, content, writer, blog.regDate, mem.nickname as writerNickname FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(blog blog_pno_pk) */ rownum as rn, pno, title, regexp_substr(content,'[^('||chr(13)||chr(10)||')]+',1,1) as content, writer, regDate FROM tbl_blog blog WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{countPerPage} ) blog INNER JOIN tbl_member mem ON blog.writer = mem.email WHERE rn > (#{page} - 1) * #{countPerPage}
SELECT pno, title, content, writer, blog.regDate, mem.nickname as writerNickname FROM tbl_blog blog INNER JOIN tbl_member mem ON blog.writer = mem.email WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_blog (pno, title, content, writer) VALUES (seq_blog.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_blog SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updateDate = sysdate WHERE pno = #{pno}
